title: Dahlia
description: He’s hot, strong and perfect… and he hates me. And not because of who I am, but what I am: A Rexford. My family is rich and powerful. My reputation precedes me, but it’s false. No matter how good I try to be, I will always pay for the sins of my father.  She’s sexy, sweet and passionate… and I want her to be Mine. But there’s no way I’m giving in. I’ll make her feel small, like she deserves. I’ll show her who has the power. She means nothing to me and never will. She can’t, because she’ll always be A Rexford girl.  Dahlia is the first book in a trilogy featuring the notorious Rexford Girls. Each book highlights a relationship that can be read as a standalone, but the series is best read in order. Get ready to be lost in a story with angst, intrigue and steamy passion.  Dahlia is an Enemies-to-Lovers/ Bully Romance with strong D/s themes and contains sexual content best suited for 18+
author: Misty Stoneheart
